QA.Answer: The page is still under construction and developed with reference to [CHI2023 accessibility requirements](https://chi2023.acm.org/for-attendees/chi2023-accessibility-faq/). More information will be up soon. Please email yichen.wang@anu.edu.au if you have any accessibility enquires about attending OzCHI2022.
QA.Question: Welcome

QA.Answer: The Accessibility Chair for OzCHI2022 is Yichen Wang. If you have any accessibility needs or enquires such as wheelchair access, requesting transport during the conference, or any concerns related to accessibility, please email yichen.wang@anu.edu.au. We will try our best to see what we can work out with our venue [The Shine Dome](https://www.shinedome.org.au).
QA.Question: Who should I talk to if I have accessibility needs for attending OzCHI2022?
